TextBlock.Text: NYLOX: It's been four days since the crash, and we're running out of supplies. Namely, oxygen. They've gone so far as to plant all the tree seeds they have.
NYLOX: I'm using this as a journal for anybody to find if we die. I feel bad for anybody else unfortunate enough to crash here.
NYLOX: Over the past few days, the rest of us Nomai have been trying to build shelter to no avail.
NYLOX: Over that time, we've occasionally seen a slightly-green tinted moon that tends to 'wander about'. It's nothing like that <color=purple>Quantum Lean.</color>
NYLOX: Anyways, where was I? Right. The top of the tribe are devising a building three-layers thick, and four stories high, that will house all of us.
NYLOX: It's our only hope. I'll update my journal if I come out of this... not dead.
